channel.title: Help Me Plz I will Do AnyThing!
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: :confused: :eek: :eek: Any1 help me out plz plz plz plz i will even pay u real rs money if u wnt.......!! Right this is my situation.
i have a real good mate that knows alot about servers and he talk me through everything.... it was then time to port forward so people can acces my server... i done this process on my router (bthomehub) ad still people cant logon have i dne port forwarding right if not plz tell me......!!!
thanks alot
toddieowns1 p.s u will be te BEST ever if u help me out!!!! :) :confused:
